title: screen.css
content: @import url(https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:400,300); body { margin: 0px; padding: 0px; background-color: #f9f9f9; font-family:'Trebuchet MS', 'Lucida Console', sans-serif; /* color:#7b7b7b; */ color:#595959; font-size:13px; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing:1px; } *+html body { letter-spacing:0px; } img { border: 0px; } .imweb-logo-print { display: none; } .sprites { background-repeat:no-repeat; background-image: url(imweb-sprites2.png); } .bx-wrapper .bx-controls-direction a.disabled { display: inline !important; opacity: 0.3; } /* .header { background-position:0px -520px;width:1000px;height:135px; margin: 15px 0px 5px 7px; font-size: 0px; border: 1px solid #000; } */ .header { background-image:none; font-size: 0; height: 63px; margin: 15px 0 5px 7px; width: 1000px; } .header a { height: 70px; display: block; text-decoration: none; } .jobs { background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) linear-gradient(to bottom, #ff7409 0%, #ff4309 100%) repeat scroll 0 0; border: 1px solid #e06c14; border-radius: 5px; color: #fff; font-family: "Open Sans",sans-serif; font-size: 14px; padding: 5px 10px; position: absolute; right: 40px; text-align: center; top: 30px; width: auto; } .jobs a { color: #fff !important; text-decoration: none; } .jobs:hover { background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) linear-gradient(to bottom, #ff4309 0%, #fb6739 100%) repeat scroll 0 0; cursor:pointer; } .box { width: 1014px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; position: relative; } .boxoben { background-position:0px -135px;width:1014px;height:14px; } .boxmitte { background-repeat:repeat-y; background-image: url(inhaltbox-mitte.png); background-position:0px 0px;width:1014px; padding-top: 9px; } .inhalt { padding: 30px 40px 20px; position:relative; } *+html .inhalt { min-height: 435px; } .boxunten { background-position:0px -152px;width:1014px;height:14px; } .hrefbutton { color: #7B7B7B !important; display: block; } .abbrechen, .speichern, .normalbutton, .klick, .loginbutton { background: url("icon-schliessen.png") no-repeat scroll 4px 3px #FFFFFF !important; border: 1px solid #DBDBDB !important; border-radius: 23px 23px 23px 23px !important; color: #595959 !important; font-size: 11px !important; height: 23px !important; line-height: 22px !important; cursor:pointer; overflow: hidden !important; padding: 1px 12px 1px 25px !important; text-decoration: none !important; } .formbutton { padding: 0px 12px 1px 25px !important; } .normalbutton, .klick { background: url("icon-buttonnormal.png") no-repeat scroll 4px 4px #FFFFFF !important; margin-right: 10px; } .normalbutton:hover, .klick:hover { background: url("icon-buttonnormal.png") no-repeat scroll 4px 4px #F0F0F0 !important; } .buttonrechts { float: right; margin:0px 10px 0px 0px!important; } .floatright { float: right; } .speichern { background:#b0d2f3 url('icon-speichern.png') no-repeat 4px 3px!important; } .speichern-mini { background:#ccebff url('icon-speichern.png') no-repeat 4px 3px!important; } .loginbutton { background:#fff url('icon-speichern.png') no-repeat 4px 4px!important; font-weight: bold; } .loginbutton:hover { background:#F6F6F6 url('icon-speichern.png') no-repeat 4px 4px!important; font-weight: bold; } .unterkuftanbieten { border: 1px solid #da6c1d !important; padding: 1px 12px 1px 12px !important; background: url("hg-unterkunft.jpg") repeat-x top left #ff8425 !important; color: #fff!important; font-weight: bold; text-shadow: 1px 1px 0px #a0531b; } .unterkuftanbieten:hover { background: url("hg-unterkunft_over.jpg") repeat-x top left #ff8425 !important; } .buttonbar { border: 0px solid #000; height:29px; width: 700px; position: absolute; /*top:97px; */ top:36px; right: 18px; z-index: 1; } .slogan { padding: 10px 30px 10px 30px; text-align: center; font-size: 30px; color: #9C9E9F; font-family:Arial; } .slogan span { font-size:20px; padding-top: 10px; display: block; } .facts { padding: 50px 30px 10px 30px; text-align: left; font-size: 17px; color: #9C9E9F; width: 500px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; } .facts-anmelden { width: 650px; padding: 15px 30px 10px 30px; line-height: 30px; background-color:rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9); } .facts .icon-check { color: #22588d; padding-right: 7px; } .registrieren { padding-bottom: 10px; width: auto; text-align: center; margin: 0px; color: #FE7409; } .zitat { padding-top: 20px; padding-bottom: 30px; padding-right: 60px; font-size:13px; text-align: right; } .inhalt a { color:#5964CB; } .inhalt a:hover { color: #182CEA; } .inhalt a:visited { color: #686666; } .textblockgross { margin-top:40px; } .textblockgross h1, .gutter h1, .gutter-login h1 { font-size:16px; margin: 0px 0px 10px 0px; padding: 0px 0px 7px 25px; border-bottom: 1px solid #e7e8e8; background-position:left -422px; background-position: left -420px\9; } *+html .textblockgross h1, *+html .gutter h1 { background-position:left -420px; } h1.punkt-mini { background-position:left -499px!important; } h1.punkt-grau { background-position:left -197px!important; } .trenner { margin: 10px 0px 10px 0px; padding: 0px; background-color: #e7e8e8; height: 1px; font-size: 0px; } .textblockgross h3 { font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; margin: 0px 0px 10px 0px; } .textblockgross h4 { font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; margin: 0px 0px 10px 0px; } .bildlinks { float: left; padding-right: 18px; } .bildrechts { float: right; padding-left: 18px; } .mehrlink { float: right; font-size: 11px !important; color: #7b7b7b!important; text-decoration: none; display: block; background-position:-994px -224px; padding:1px 0px 2px 25px; margin-top:3px; text-decoration: underline; } *+html .mehrlink { margin-top: -25px; } .mehrlink:hover { color:#636363!important; } .gutter { width: 452px; float: left; margin-top:20px; } .gutter-login { width: 291px; float: left; margin-top:20px; } .gutter-login-news { width: 612px; } .fuss { width: 1014px; margin:10px auto 30px auto; position: relative; text-align: center; font-size:11px; height: 150px; } .fuss a { text-decoration: none; color:#595959; } .q-deutschland { padding-top: 25px; border:0px; } /* ###### navig ####### */ .navig { height: 27px; margin-left: 7px; margin-right: 7px; } ul.dropdown { padding:0px; margin:0px 0px 0px 0px; list-style-type:none; z-index:50; font-size: 15px; } /* unter ul */ ul.dropdown ul { display:none; margin:27px 0px 0px -1px; list-style-type:none; position:absolute; z-index:50; border: 1px solid #e6e6e6; background-color: #f0f0f0; width: 170px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 8px; margin-left: -12px; } *+html ul.dropdown ul { margin-left: -117px; } ul.dropdown li { float:left; } ul.dropdown li li { clear: left; padding:3px; position:relative; background-image:none; margin-left:-1px; } li#navstart ul li { margin-left:0px!important; } ul.dropdown a {display:block;} ul.dropdown li:hover ul ul {display:none;} ul.dropdown li:hover ul ul ul {display:none;} ul.dropdown li:hover ul ul ul ul {display:none;} ul.dropdown li:hover ul {display:block} ul.dropdown ul li:hover ul {display:block} ul.dropdown ul ul li:hover ul {display:block} /* der style ---------- */ ul.dropdown li a { display: block; float: left; font-size:14px; height: 25px; line-height: 25px; text-decoration: none; color:#595959; width: 105px; text-align: center; border-top: 1px solid #e6e6e6; border-bottom: 1px solid #e6e6e6; background-color: #f0f0f0; letter-spacing: 0px; } ul.dropdown li ul li a { display: block; /*width: 150px;*/ width: 169px; border-top:0px !important; border-bottom:0px !important; background:transparent !important; } .dropdown ul li a { text-align: left; } /* ul.dropdown ul a { wwidth: 160px alte breite 170 } */ .nohover { font-size:0px; background-color:#172983; } .navigtrenner { background-position:0px -169px; float: left; width: 22px; height:27px; } .pfeilunternavig { background-position:right -169px; } .naviggrauon { background-color: #E2E2E2!important; border-top: 1px solid #cecece!important; border-bottom: 1px solid #cecece!important; } .navigtrennerende { background-position:-25px -169px; float: left; width: 22px; height:27px; } .navigtrennervor { background-position:-50px -169px; float: left; width: 22px; height:27px; } .navigende { width: 111px!important; } .navigzimmer a.navigzimmer, .navigtechnologie a.navigtechnologie, .navigzimmer a.navigzimmer, .navigpauschalen a.navigpauschalen, .navigtickets a.navigtickets, .navigkurkarten a.navigkurkarten, .naviggastgeber a.naviggastgeber, .navigprospekte a.navigprospekte, .navigbranchenbuch a.navigbranchenbuch, .navigbewertungen a.navigbewertungen, .navigcrm a.navigcrm, .navigweb2print a.navigweb2print, .navigpremiumvertrieb a.navigpremiumvertrieb, .navigschnittstellen a.navigschnittstellen, .navigbuchungsmaske a.navigbuchungsmaske, .navigcallcenter a.navigcallcenter, .navigiphoneapp a.navigiphoneapp, .navigpresse a.navigpresse, .navigaktuell a.navigaktuell, .naviggreen a.naviggreen, .navigbuchungsmaskemo a.navigbuchungsmaskemo, .navigonepage a.navigonepage, .navigstellenangebote a.navigstellenangebote, .navigminiaccountmobi a.navigminiaccountmobi, .navigservicequalitae a.navigservicequalitae, .navigteam a.navigteam, .navignewsarchiv a.navignewsarchiv { font-weight: bold; background-color: #E2E2E2 !important; border-bottom: 1px solid #CECECE !important; border-top: 1px solid #CECECE !important; margin-left: -10px; padding-left: 10px; } .navigtechnologie a.navigtechnologie, .navigaktuell a.navigaktuell { margin-top: -4px; } .navigschnittstellen a.navigschnittstellen, .navigpresse a.navigpresse { margin-bottom: -4px; } /* navig ende ---------- */ /* ########## hinweise no java ########## */ .achtungjava { background-color:#ff6d03; left: 160px; top:210px; height:110px; width:700px; position: absolute; color:#fff; z-index:48; border:2px solid #979393; font-size:13pt; background:#ff6d03 url(browser-info.jpg) no-repeat 13px 50%; } .browser { background-color:#ff6d03; left: 160px; top:350px; height:110px; width:700px; position: absolute; color:#fff; z-index:48; border:2px solid #979393; font-size:13pt; background:#ff6d03 url(browser-info.jpg) no-repeat 13px 50%; } .browser div { padding:0px 0px 0px 125px; border:0px solid #0f0; margin:10px 0px 0px 0px } .achtungjava div { padding:0px 0px 0px 125px; border:0px solid #0f0; margin:22px 0px 0px 0px } /* ########## hinweise no java ########## ENDE */ .bildmitte { margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; margin-bottom: 15px; } /* ########## buchungsteaser ########## */ .sbar { display:inline; } .usbar { display:none; } #bkteaser { width:968px; white-space:nowrap; margin:0px; margin-top:-5px; } #bkteaser fieldset { border: 0px; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; } #bkteaser .searchbtn { width:100%; } #bkteaser .detailsearch{ text-align:center; width:100%; margin-top:5px; } #bkteaser .title { display:block; margin:-2px 0px 2px 0px; padding:0; font-weight:bold; } #bkteaser .blockeins { white-space:nowrap; margin:11px 0px 0px 0px; border:1px solid #E9E9E9; background-color:#FAFAFA; padding:6px 0px 6px 6px; width:453px; float: left; } .bkanreise { margin-right: 11px!important; } #bkteaser .pers { margin:11px 10px 0 0; border:1px solid #E9E9E9; background-color:#FAFAFA; padding:3px 0px 6px 6px; float: left; width:453px; } #bkteaser .kind { margin:0px; border:1px solid #E9E9E9; margin:11px 0px 0px 0px; background-color:#FAFAFA; padding:3px 0px 6px 6px; width:453px; float:left; } #bkteaser .kinder { white-space:nowrap; margin:11px 0px 0px 0px; border:1px solid #E9E9E9; background-color:#FAFAFA; padding:6px 0px 6px 6px; width:453px; float:left; } #bkteaser .adult { width:150px; } #bkteaser .child { width:150px; } #kinder { float:left; } #bkteaser .regio { margin-top:11px !important; width: 925px; } #bkteaser .senden { padding:11px 0px 0px 0px; clear:both; } #bkteaser .senden input { border:0;margin-top:0px;height:31px; } .teasersubmit { border:1px solid #f67929!important; height:30px!important; background:#fff0e4 url('buchungsmaske-button-hg.jpg') repeat-x 0px 0px; color:#fff; width: 934px; } /* ########## buchungsteaser ende ########## */ .anmelden { width: 140px; float: left; text-align: right; padding-right:18px; margin-bottom:10px; } .start-premiumvertrieb { width: 100%; margin-top: 18px; } .premiumvertrieb-logo { height: 102px; width: 250px; float: left; margin-bottom: 16px; } .premiumvertrieb-logo img, .atraveo-img img, .premiumvertrieb-img a img { border: 1px solid #b2b2b2; } .premiumvertrieb-img { margin-right:35px; height: 86px; width: 207px; float: left; margin-bottom: 35px; } .atraveo-img { height: 176px; width: 933px; float: left; margin-bottom: 35px; } .premiumvertrieb-img-end { margin-right:0px; } .premiumvertrieb-name { float: left; height: 102px; line-height: 102px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 16px; width: auto; } /* anmelden */ .rot, #rot { border: 1px solid red !important; } .fromabstand { margin-bottom:10px; } #pflichtbox { margin-top:50%; } #pflichtboxx { margin-top:50%; } .pflicht { margin-bottom:10px;background-color:#C81D1D;padding:0.6em;color:#FFFFFF; border-radius: 0.6em 0.6em 0.6em 0.6em; text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #000; } .ok { margin-bottom:10px;background-color:#307828;padding:0.6em;color:#FFFFFF;font-weight:bold; border-radius: 0.6em 0.6em 0.6em 0.6em; text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #000; } legend { color: #7B7B7B; float: left; height: 20px; line-height: 23px; margin-right: 15px; padding-bottom: 3px; text-align: right; width: 212px; } fieldset { border: 0px solid #dadada; } *+html legend { padding-bottom:3px; clear: none; width: 212px; text-align: left; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: -3px; color:#7b7b7b; } .zimmer-login { border-bottom: 1px solid #E7E8E8; height: 45px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; } .zimmer-login-border { border-top: 1px solid #E7E8E8; } .zimmer-login span { padding-bottom:0px; float:left; width: 90px; margin-right: 40px; font-weight: bold; height: 45px; line-height: 45px; display: block; text-align: right; } .zimmer-login input, .zimmer-login select { background-color: #FFFFFF; border: 1px solid #D1C5C5; color: #595959; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS','Lucida Console',sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; margin: 13px 0px 0px 0px; padding: 1px; width: 129px; } .zimmer-login-admin { border: 2px solid #FE7D18; height: 139px; } .anmelden-hotline { border: 2px solid #FE7D18; } .zimmer-login-wl { border: 2px solid #d2d2d2; margin-top:5px; } .zimmer-login-mini { border: 2px solid #3CA7E5; height: 139px; } .zimmer-login-grau { background-color: #f2f2f2; } .zimmer-login-hellgrau { background-color: #FBFBFB; } .anmelden-senden { width: 100%; height: 30px; } /* seite vor zurueck */ .modulzurueck { display:block;margin-top:15px;padding-left:15px;height:20px;line-height:20px;text-decoration:none;float:left;width:200px; background-position:-6px -457px; } .modulvor { display:block;margin-top:15px;padding-right:15px;height:20px;line-height:20px;text-decoration:none;text-align:right;float:right;width:200px; background-position:right -496px; } .impressum-bildnachweise { float: left; margin: 15px 56px 15px 0; text-align: center; width: 255px; } .impressum-bildnachweise img { margin-bottom: 5px; } .login-hilfe { display: block; width: 222px; height: 45px; background-repeat:no-repeat; background-image: url(login-hilfe5.png); background-position:0px 0px; top:-15px; right: 28px; position: absolute; z-index: 10; opacity: 0.3; } .navigzimmerlogin .login-hilfe { display: none; } *+html .login-hilfe { top:-15px; } .admin-error { border: 0px solid #000; float: left; font-size: 13px; color: #f4490b; font-weight: bold; height: 22px; line-height: 22px; } .admin-error span { font-size: 20px; float: left; margin-right: 8px; margin-left: 8px; } .input-admin-error input, .input-mini-error input { border: 1px solid #FF1E00!important; } .input-admin-error span, .input-mini-error span { color: #FF1E00!important; } .navigzimmerlogin .bildnone { display: none; } .grafik-rahmen { border: 1px solid #FFA04D; float: left; margin-right: 18px; margin-top: 3px; } .startbild { margin-top:22px } .referenzen-box { float: left; margin: 0 42px 15px 0; width: 202px; } .referenzen-box img { border: 1px solid #E7E8E8; } .referenzen-name { display: block; padding: 3px 0px 3px 0px; text-align: center; font-size:11px; } .referenzen-box-ende { margin-right: 0px!important; } .referenzen-box-ende-unten { margin-bottom: 0px!important; } .anmelden-fakten { font-weight: bold; } .pfeil-orange { color: #F76F1E; font-size:26px; } .gutter legend, .gutter-login legend { padding-bottom:3px; float:left; width:114px; text-align: right; margin-right: 10px; color:#7b7b7b; } .gutter legend.legendort, .gutter-login legend.legendort { padding-bottom:3px; float:left; width:65px; text-align: right; margin-right: 15px; color:#7b7b7b; } .gutter fieldset, .gutter-login fieldset { border: 0px solid #dadada; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px 8px 0px; } .gutter .fieldsetzwei, .gutter-login .fieldsetzwei { border: 0px solid #dadada; margin: 0px; padding: 6px 0px 6px 0px; width: 220px; float: left; } .gutter fieldset input, .gutter-login fieldset input { width:308px!important; background-color: #FFFFFF; border: 1px solid #D1C5C5; color: #595959; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS','Lucida Console',sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; padding: 1px; } .gutter fieldset.fieldsetzwei input, .gutter-login fieldset.fieldsetzwei input { width:88px!important; } .gutter fieldset.fieldsetzwei input.inputort, .gutter-login fieldset.fieldsetzwei input.inputort { width:132px!important; } .gutter fieldset.rueckantwort input { width: 30px!important; } .fromabstandgutter { margin-bottom:5px; background-color: #F9F9F9; } *+html .gutter .fromabstandgutter legend { padding-bottom:3px; width: 115px; text-align: left; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: -3px; color:#7b7b7b; margin-bottom: -30px; } *+html .gutter .fromabstandgutter input { margin-left:100px; } *+html .gutter .fromabstandgutter .rueckantwort legend, *+html .gutter .fromabstandgutter .bemerkung-form legend { margin-bottom: 0px; } *+html .gutter .fromabstandgutter input.anmelden-senden { margin-left:0px!important; } .anmelden-hotline { padding:10px 10px 10px 90px;margin-top:199px; background: url("hoerer.png") no-repeat 30px 50%; } .login-prem-text { text-align:right; margin-top:20px; } .login-prem-mitte { text-align: center; } .login-prem-schrift { font-size: 14px; } .login-prem-oran { color:#EA733B; font-size:14px; } .orang { color:#FE7409!important; display: inline!important; font-size: 30px!important; padding:0px!important; } .orange { color:#25588d!important; display: inline!important; } .mitgliedschaften { height: 100px; width: auto; float: left; margin-top: 28px; margin-right: 28px; } .overview-box { /*background: none repeat scroll 0 0 #F0F0F0; border: 1px solid #C7C7C7;'*/ width: 140px; height: 140px; float:left; border-radius: 100px 100px 100px 100px; position: relative; margin-right: 13px; margin-bottom: 13px; } .transition { -webkit-transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out; -moz-transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out; -o-transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out; -ms-transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out; } .overview-box span { font-size: 50px; text-align: center; width: 140px; height: 140px; border-radius: 100px 100px 100px 100px; z-index:300; color: #595959; line-height: 120px; display: block; } .overview-box:hover { /*background: none repeat scroll 0 0 #ffffff; border: 1px solid #FE7D18;*/ } .overview-box:hover span, .overview-box:hover div { color: #FE7D18; } .overview-box div { bottom: 30px; font-size: 12px; left: 0; position: absolute; text-align: center; width: 140px; } .overview-box div, .overview-box div a { color: #595959; } .gardientwhite { position:relative; width:934px; } .gardientwhite-inline { position:absolute; bottom:0; width:100%; } .sliderlinks { width: 490px; float: left; padding-right: 18px; margin-top: -15px; } .sildertext { margin-top: 35px; } .imagegallerymobil { display: none; } .tp23 { background-position:0px -2815px; } .ui-accordion-header { background-position: left -198px; border-bottom: 1px solid #E7E8E8; font-size: 16px; margin: 0 0 10px; padding: 0 0 7px 25px; background-image: url("imweb-sprites.png"); background-repeat: no-repeat; cursor: pointer; color: #aaa9a9; } .ui-accordion-content-active { border-bottom: 1px solid #E7E8E8; margin-bottom: 6px; } .ui-accordion-header-active, .ui-accordion-header:hover { background-position: left -666px; color:#595959!important; } .accordion-time { float: right; } .ui-accordion-header-active span.accordion-time, .ui-accordion-header span.accordion-time:hover { color:#595959!important; } .normalbutton-noicon { background-image: none!important;
